apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji showcases two men, one with a dark skin tone and the other with a neutral, un-toned appearance, united by a prominent heart symbol. The heart itself gleams with Apple's signature glossy red, radiating warmth and affection, while the figures are rendered with soft, rounded edges and gentle shading.  This depiction celebrates diverse love and companionship, offering a visually appealing and inclusive representation of romantic connection as seen through Apple's thoughtful emoji design.
